testcase.name: Add new customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When Users Open URl "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And Users Enters Email As "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin".....passed And Click on the login button...............................................passed Then User can see the dashboard.............................................passed When User click on customer menu............................................passed And click on customer menu item.............................................passed And click on add new customer button........................................passed Then User can see add new customer page.....................................passed When User enter new customer info...........................................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message " The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Loging Withe Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When Users Open URl "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And Users Enters Email As "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin".....passed And Click on the login button...............................................passed And Page Title Should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"...........passed When User click on the logout button........................................passed Then logout page title should be "Your store. Login"........................passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Login data driven2 - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When Users Open URl "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And Users Enters Email As "admin1@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin1"...passed And Click on the login button...............................................passed Then Failed login Page Title Should be "Login was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.".passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Login data driven2 - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When Users Open URl "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And Users Enters Email As "admin2@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin2"...passed And Click on the login button...............................................passed Then Failed login Page Title Should be "Login was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.".passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed
